name: Email

methods.name: setBccSender
methods.description: Indicates whether the email sender receives a copy of the email that is sent. For a mass mail, the sender is only copied on the first email sent.

methods.name: setReplyTo
methods.description: Optional. The email address that receives the message when a recipient replies.

methods.name: setTemplateID
methods.description: The ID of the template to be merged to create this email. Specify a value for setTemplateId, setHtmlBody, or setPlainTextBody. Or, you can define both setHtmlBody and setPlainTextBody.

methods.name: setSaveAsActivity
methods.description: Optional. The default value is true, meaning the email is saved as an activity. This argument only applies if the recipient list is based on targetObjectId or targetObjectIds. If HTML email tracking is enabled for the organization, you will be able to track open rates.

methods.name: setSenderDisplayName
methods.description: Optional. The name that appears on the From line of the email. This cannot be set if the object associated with a setOrgWideEmailAddressId for a SingleEmailMessage has defined its DisplayName field.

methods.name: setUseSignature
methods.description: Indicates whether the email includes an email signature if the user has one configured. The default is true, meaning if the user has a signature it is included in the email unless you specify false.

description: Contains base email methods common to both single and mass
